show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

header.title: and Dr Z4 Pillars of Health: Heart Disease

title: and Dr Z4 Pillars of Health: Heart Disease
content:
Host Ellen Kamhi, PhD RN, www.naturalnurse.com, interviews David Foreman RPh. David Forman is well recognized as correspondent and radio host of the syndicated show, “The Herbal Pharmacist.
He is a registered pharmacist and author.
David is well versed on the healing powers of herbs, vitamins and other natural supplements.
Foreman is a graduate of the University of South Carolina College of Pharmacy and is author of, “4 Pillars of Health: Heart Disease.
” He is also author of The Herbal Pharmacist Newsletter distributed exclusively through The Vitamin Shoppe.
Foreman is a frequent speaker at some of America’s leading universities, medical groups and hospitals on the subject of natural health and healing.
His shift from traditional pharmacist to herbal pharmacist was based on his belief that education is the key to the understanding that natural health plays a vital roll in traditional medicine, and should also be included in conventional medicine protocols.
He has dedicated his entire career to educating consumers about the benefits and power behind natural herbs and supplements.
Contact: http://www.herbalpharmacist.com
